title: C# Language
description: C# is a modern, safe, and general purpose language that makes developers productive while writing high-performance code. The C# language is the most popular language for the .NET platform, a free, cross-platform, open source development environment.

golden-reference.name: Golden Reference Document

self.name: self
self.description: Collection topic covering key C# 14 language features including the `field` keyword in properties, first-class Span types, unbound generic types in `nameof`, enhanced lambda parameters, partial events and constructors, Extensions, null-conditional assignment, user-defined compound assignment operators, and expression tree improvements. Each feature enhances developer productivity and safety with modern syntax.
